body.bibl: Keulen, Percy S. F. van. “Lexicographical Troubles with the Cardinal Numerals 1-20 in the Aramaic of the Targumim and in Classical Syriac.” In Foundations for Syriac Lexicography IV: Colloquia of the International Syriac Language Project, edited by Kristian S. Heal and Alison Salvesen, 169–80. Perspectives on Syriac Linguistics 5. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2014.
